Description:
Understand & follow work rules:· Follow attendance rules.
· Follow all safety standards and enforce them on subordinates.
· Follow quality standards and ensure product to be within standardSafety & housekeeping:· Wear all required Personal protective equipment. ·
Operate machine withing safety standards (do not touch equipment while operating, ensure safety guards installed in mechanical parts of the machine)
· Apply LOTO when preforming maintenance task in machine.
· Ensure area of responsibility to be in good housekeeping condition and follow 6S principlesOperation:· Maintains, operates, troubleshoots, and adjusts all assigned equipment.
· Performs bottle quality checks as directed.
· Assists the foreman in maintaining product output according to current manufacturing procedure and specifications. · Oversees the work of the crew during the foreman’s absence.
· Completes reports, work orders, and maintains records as directed by the shift foreman.
· Assists in inventory of materials and empty ware.
· Trains other blow moulding personnel when required.
· Maintains his work area in a clean and orderly condition.
· Understands and follows all plant safety, work, and attendance rules, and enforces same when he is acting foreman.
· Assist shift foreman in controlling spare parts availability.
· Technical support in the implementation of qualification and validation
· Participation in the implementation of improvement measures
· Submit a written report of his assignments accomplished on daily basis.
· Understands quality bottles inspection and Solves quality problems.
· Maintains B/M machines and case erector.
· Repairs machines Minor trouble shooting
· PC literature to record the quality sheet.
· Performs other duties as assigned.Skills
Skills: 1- 2 years in Blow molding and injection plastic operation
High school degree or Technical diploma (mechanical is preferable)
sense of troubleshooting root cause if issue causing quality defect, basic knowledge & skill of using tools
· Adherence to health and safety regulations
· Ability to read blueprints, schematics, and manuals.
· Ability to quickly learn production equipment.
